code: import{useDispatch,useSelector}from'react-redux';import*as actions from'../redux/patients/actions';export function usePatients(){var dispatch=useDispatch();var patients=useSelector(function(state){return state.patients;});console.log(patients);var editPatient=function editPatient(patient){return dispatch(actions.editPatient(patient));};var addPatient=function addPatient(patient){return dispatch(actions.addPatient(patient));};var deletePatient=function deletePatient(id){return dispatch(actions.deletePatient(id));};return{patients:patients,addPatient:addPatient,editPatient:editPatient,deletePatient:deletePatient};}
